name: IT DEV GROUP
description:
Our core mission - is to deliver a high-quality product for your business processes automatization. Implement your idea from scratch to a viable product and get a ready-made tool for business. We are a web development company, that allows you to create stable products quickly with the help of our strong expertise.
We have a narrow technical stack, and we see this as an advantage. We know all the pitfalls and best practices in these technologies.
To make sure that the product we create is not only stable but also modern, we have an internal team of designers who bring color and joy to every idea.
Technology stack we use:
PHP 7.1-7.3, Laravel 5.5-6.0, Symfony 4
Mysql, PostgreSQL, MSSQL, Redis, Memcached, MongoDB
Elastic Search
HTML5, CSS3, SCSS
Javascript (ES6, Typescript). Angular 6-8, Vue + Nuxt, Node.js, Ionic
Other skills and technologies:
Linux (Ubuntu), AWS (ES2, RDS, S3, Lambda, Cloud Front, Load Balancing), Docker,
CI/CD, Bitbucket, Pipelines
Our focus is on:
- High-load E-commerce systems;
- ERP, CRM, SAAS systems;
- Mobile applications;
- UI / UX solutions;
- B2B, B2C platform;
- integration with third-party services;
- MVP development for startups;
We solve business problems with modern technologies for our customers.
